data.headline: Dow climbed to fresh record highs near 50,400 amid rotation into blue chips
bullets: S&P 500 and Nasdaq slipped, pressured by weakness in tech and communication services
Megacap stocks underperformed as traders rotated out on AI disruption concerns
December retail sales came in flat and below expectations, fueling slowdown worries
10-year Treasury yields fell to four-week lows, boosting Fed rate-cut expectations
Blue chips outperformed growth stocks as traders favored defensive positioning
Datadog, Spotify, and Hasbro were among notable gainers on stock-specific news
Coca-Cola and CVS declined after issuing cautious guidance and outlooks
Alphabet's $30B AI bond sale and sector moves in autos and restructuring names drove additional action
Traders focused on upcoming jobs and CPI data for further market direction
